languages.text: {n}{petname} вытягивает шею, внимательно вглядываясь в ваше лицо. Черный клюв распахивается:{/n} "Поступь мрака над тускнеющими светилами".
{n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} вытягивает шею, внимательно вглядываясь в ваше лицо. Черный клюв распахивается:{/n} "Поступь мрака над тускнеющими светилами".

traits.locale_text: {n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching beneath fading suns."
{n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching beneath fading suns."
{n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching beneath fading suns."
{n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching beneath fading suns."
{n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."
{n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."

languages.text: {n}レイヴンは首を伸ばし、あなたの顔をじっと見つめた。黒いくちばしが開いた。{/n}「暗闇が、色あせる太陽を越えて進軍してくる」
languages.original_text: {n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンは首を伸ばし、あなたの顔をじっと見つめた。黒いくちばしが開いた。{/n}「暗闇が、色あせる太陽を越えて進軍してくる」

languages.text: {n}Der Rabe reckt den Hals und starrt dir ins Gesicht. Sein schwarzer Schnabel öffnet sich:{/n} "Dunkelheit marschiert über verblassende Sonnen."
languages.original_text: {n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rabe reckt den Hals und starrt dir ins Gesicht. Sein schwarzer Schnabel öffnet sich:{/n} "Dunkelheit marschiert über verblassende Sonnen."

languages.text: {n}La corneille penche la tête et observe votre visage avec attention. Elle ouvre son bec d'ébène et déclare :{/n} « L'obscurité marche sur les soleils en déclin. »
languages.original_text: {n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."

traits.locale_text: {n}La corneille penche la tête et observe votre visage avec attention. Elle ouvre son bec d'ébène et déclare :{/n} « L'obscurité marche sur les soleils en déclin. »

languages.text: {n}El cuervo estira el cuello, con la mirada fija en tu rostro, y abre su negro pico:{/n} «Cae la oscuridad sobre los soles moribundos».
languages.original_text: {n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuervo estira el cuello, con la mirada fija en tu rostro, y abre su negro pico:{/n} «Cae la oscuridad sobre los soles moribundos».

languages.text: {n}渡鸦伸长了脖子，凝视着你的脸，张开了黑色的喙。{/n}“黑暗吞噬褪色的恒星。”
languages.original_text: {n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."

traits.locale_text: {n}渡鸦伸长了脖子，凝视着你的脸，张开了黑色的喙。{/n}“黑暗吞噬褪色的恒星。”

languages.text: {n}Kuzgun, boynunu bükerek yüzüne bakıyor. Kara gagası aralanıyor.{/n} "Karanlık, solan güneşlerin üzerine çöküyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The raven cranes its neck, staring into your face. Its black beak opens:{/n} "Darkness marching over fading suns."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgun boynunu bükerek yüzüne bakıyor. Kara gagası aralanıyor:{/n} "Karanlık, solan güneşlerin üzerine çöküyor."
